overview: When the Araki gang harass Bok-Sun, Chil-Bok kills Araki by heading. Bak Jang-Sohn hides Bok-Sun and Chil-Bok in danger. Japanese policemen arrest and send Chil-Bok to prison and Park Jang-Sun run away. Released from the prison owing to the liberation of the country, Chil-Bok punishes the scoundrels with heading. And because of it, he meets Bok-Sun again but she runs away from him. Song Dal-Su dominates the underworld of Seoul and goes to Pyeong-Yang Myeon-Ok and beats off Park Jang-Sohn for he's been afraid of him who knows about his past. Chil-Bok meets Bok-Sun through a pickpocket's arrangement and hears from her about Song Dal-Su. Chil-Bok makes Song Dal-Su give in who is the foe of his father and lover.
title: Man from Pyeongyang
